ComicInfo.Title: Eelo the Fish Man; The Heidites of Mercury; The Legend of the Haunted Well: Part 2; The Inventions of Prof. Snead; Island in Space [The Hoppers]; Miracle Men; The Vanishing Vessels
ComicInfo.Summary: On their way to the Moon, Space Smith and Dianna encounter an island in space inhabited by the hostile Hoppers.
